definition: herbal plaster applied to a wound
to moisten/to grease/to apply (cream, ointment)/to dip a brush in ink
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
dogskin plaster, used in TCM for treating contusions, rheumatism etc/quack medicine/sham goods

sentences.english: I applied a poultice and the abscess opened and began to heal.
sentences.chinese: 我敷上膏藥，膿瘡迸裂，開始痊癒。

sentences.english: I need a box of plasters.
Apply a new patch if the first one becomes loose or falls off.
sentences.chinese: 如所貼膏藥已鬆開或脫落，請更換新膏藥。

sentences.english: Apply a new patch if the first one becomes loose or falls off.
sentences.chinese: 如所貼膏藥已鬆開或脫落，請更換新膏藥。

sentences.english: An agent, such as an analgesic drug, that relieves pain.
sentences.chinese: 敷這種膏藥，不僅芳香開竅，而且理氣止痛。

sentences.english: You have acquired a health poultice .
sentences.chinese: 你剛獲得了一個生命膏藥。

sentences.english: The use of a Poultice Powder will help reabsorb stains out of stone, concrete and grout surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 膏藥粉的使用將有助於石材表面污漬的清理。

sentences.english: The percentage of infecting plaster disease in cheng county in all cherries was 41.
sentences.chinese: 甘肅成縣小川鎮櫻桃樹膏藥病的發病株率爲41。

sentences.english: The massage is followed by heat poultice for maximum benefits.
sentences.chinese: 這種按摩是通過加熱的膏藥來獲得最大的利益。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo establish the production technology and quality control of black plaster and skin and external disease plaster.
sentences.chinese: 目標研究黑膏藥瘡瘍膏的生產工藝及質量標準。

sentences.english: The nurse washed and plastered the wound.
sentences.chinese: 護士清洗了傷口並在上面貼了膏藥。

sentences.english: The downpour plastered his shirt to his body.
sentences.chinese: 傾盆大雨把他的襯衫像貼膏藥一樣貼在他身上。

sentences.english: Put a plaster on the sore once a day.
sentences.chinese: 把這膏藥每日一次fu貼患處。

sentences.english: This is a special adhesive for easing the pain.
sentences.chinese: 這膏藥是專門鎮痛的，貼在疼痛部位。

sentences.english: This will use the most appropriate health poultice in your inventory.
sentences.chinese: 這會使用物品清單中最合適的生命膏藥。

definition: antipyretic (drug to reduce fever, such as sulfanilamide)
lit. doesn't hurt, doesn't tickle (idiom); sth is wrong, but not quite sure what/fig. not getting to any matter of substance/scratching the surface/superficial/perfunctory
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
effective medicine for a specific condition/highly effective medicine
to smear/to apply glue or ointment to a surface
